model= {{assetDetailsForm.formData.model}},

serial_number= {{assetDetailsForm.formData.serial_number}},

notes= {{assetDetailsForm.formData.notes}}

SELECT
    order_detail.id,
    order_detail.order_id,
    order_detail.dish_id AS order_dish_id,
    order_detail.quantity,
    restaurant_dish.id AS dish_dish_id,
    restaurant_dish.restaurant_id,
    restaurant_dish.name,
    restaurant_dish.description,
    restaurant_dish.price,
    restaurant_dish.image
FROM
    public."order_detail"
INNER JOIN
    restaurant_dish
ON
    order_detail.dish_id = restaurant_dish.id
WHERE
    order_id = {{lst_orderHistory.triggeredItem.id}};

  SET first_name = {{inp_firstName.text}},
			last_name = {{inp_lastName.text}},
			email = {{inp_email.text}},
			phone = {{inp_phone.text}},
			address = {{inp_address.text}},
			date_of_birth = {{dat_dob.formattedDate}},
			status = {{sel_verificationStatus.selectedOptionValue}},
			comment = {{rte_comments.text || ''}}
  WHERE id = {{ tbl_kycList.selectedRow.Id }};

  SET first_name = {{inp_firstName.text}},
			last_name = {{inp_lastName.text}},
			email = {{inp_email.text}},
			phone = {{inp_phone.text}},
			address = {{inp_address.text}},

actionConfiguration.body:
-- SELECT date_series.day, COUNT(kyc.created) as count
-- FROM (
  -- SELECT generate_series(
    -- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW() - INTERVAL '11 DAYS'),
    -- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()),
    -- INTERVAL '1 DAY'
  -- ) as day
-- ) AS date_series
-- LEFT JOIN kyc 
-- ON DATE_TRUNC('day', kyc.created) = date_series.day
-- GROUP BY date_series.day
-- ORDER BY date_series.day ASC;

SELECT date_series.day, COUNT(kyc.created) as count
FROM (
  SELECT generate_series(
    DATE '2023-03-19',
    DATE '2023-03-30',
    INTERVAL '1 DAY'
  ) as day
) AS date_series
LEFT JOIN kyc 
ON DATE_TRUNC('day', kyc.created) = date_series.day
GROUP BY date_series.day
ORDER BY date_series.day ASC;

-- SELECT date_series.day, COUNT(kyc.created) as count
-- FROM (
  -- SELECT generate_series(
    -- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW() - INTERVAL '11 DAYS'),
    -- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()),
    -- INTERVAL '1 DAY'
  -- ) as day
-- ) AS date_series
-- LEFT JOIN kyc 
-- ON DATE_TRUNC('day', kyc.created) = date_series.day
-- GROUP BY date_series.day
-- ORDER BY date_series.day ASC;

SELECT date_series.day, COUNT(kyc.created) as count
FROM (
  SELECT generate_series(
    DATE '2023-03-19',
    DATE '2023-03-30',
    INTERVAL '1 DAY'
  ) as day
) AS date_series
LEFT JOIN kyc 
ON DATE_TRUNC('day', kyc.created) = date_series.day
GROUP BY date_series.day
ORDER BY date_series.day ASC;

actionConfiguration.body:
function (input) {
  const roleTranslation = {
    "CEO": "Diretor Executivo",
    "CFO": "Diretor Financeiro",
    "CTO": "Diretor de Tecnologia",
    "COO": "Diretor de Operações",
    "CMO": "Diretor de Marketing",
    "CIO": "Diretor de Informação",
    "CHRO": "Diretor de Recursos Humanos",
    "Manager": "Gestor",
    "Project Manager": "Gestor de Projetos",
    "Product Manager": "Gestor de Produto",
    "Operations Manager": "Gestor de Operações",
    "Sales Manager": "Gestor de Vendas",
    "Accountant": "Contabilista",
    "Financial Analyst": "Analista Financeiro",
    "HR": "Recursos Humanos",
    "Recruiter": "Recrutador",
    "Logistics": "Logística",
    "Logistics Coordinator": "Coordenador de Logística",
    "Production": "Produção",
    "Production Supervisor": "Supervisor de Produção",
    "Marketing": "Marketing",
    "Digital Marketing Specialist": "Especialista em Marketing Digital",
    "Software Engineer": "Engenheiro de Software",
    "Developer": "Desenvolvedor",
    "IT Support": "Suporte de TI",
    "Data Analyst": "Analista de Dados",
    "Customer Support": "Apoio ao Cliente",
    "Sales Representative": "Representante de Vendas",
    "Administrative Assistant": "Assistente Administrativo",
    "User": "Utilizador"
  };
  return input.map(role => ({
    Name: roleTranslation[role.Name] || role.Name,
    Value: role.Name
  }));
}

unpublishedCollection.name: UserEditor_ConvertRoleNames
unpublishedCollection.body:
export default {
	convert(input) {
		const roleTranslation = {
			"CEO": "Diretor Executivo",
			"CFO": "Diretor Financeiro",
			"CTO": "Diretor de Tecnologia",
			"COO": "Diretor de Operações",
			"CMO": "Diretor de Marketing",
			"CIO": "Diretor de Informação",
			"CHRO": "Diretor de Recursos Humanos",
			"Manager": "Gestor",
			"Project Manager": "Gestor de Projetos",
			"Product Manager": "Gestor de Produto",
			"Operations Manager": "Gestor de Operações",
			"Sales Manager": "Gestor de Vendas",
			"Accountant": "Contabilista",
			"Financial Analyst": "Analista Financeiro",
			"HR": "Recursos Humanos",
			"Recruiter": "Recrutador",
			"Logistics": "Logística",
			"Logistics Coordinator": "Coordenador de Logística",
			"Production": "Produção",
			"Production Supervisor": "Supervisor de Produção",
			"Marketing": "Marketing",
			"Digital Marketing Specialist": "Especialista em Marketing Digital",
			"Software Engineer": "Engenheiro de Software",
			"Developer": "Desenvolvedor",
			"IT Support": "Suporte de TI",
			"Data Analyst": "Analista de Dados",
			"Customer Support": "Apoio ao Cliente",
			"Sales Representative": "Representante de Vendas",
			"Administrative Assistant": "Assistente Administrativo",
			"User": "Utilizador"
		};

		return input.map(role => ({
			Name: roleTranslation[role.Name] || role.Name,
			Value: role.Name
		}));
	}
}

publishedCollection.name: UserEditor_ConvertRoleNames
publishedCollection.body:
export default {
	convert(input) {
		const roleTranslation = {
			"CEO": "Diretor Executivo",
			"CFO": "Diretor Financeiro",
			"CTO": "Diretor de Tecnologia",
			"COO": "Diretor de Operações",
			"CMO": "Diretor de Marketing",
			"CIO": "Diretor de Informação",
			"CHRO": "Diretor de Recursos Humanos",
			"Manager": "Gestor",
			"Project Manager": "Gestor de Projetos",
			"Product Manager": "Gestor de Produto",
			"Operations Manager": "Gestor de Operações",
			"Sales Manager": "Gestor de Vendas",
			"Accountant": "Contabilista",
			"Financial Analyst": "Analista Financeiro",
			"HR": "Recursos Humanos",
			"Recruiter": "Recrutador",
			"Logistics": "Logística",
			"Logistics Coordinator": "Coordenador de Logística",
			"Production": "Produção",
			"Production Supervisor": "Supervisor de Produção",
			"Marketing": "Marketing",
			"Digital Marketing Specialist": "Especialista em Marketing Digital",
			"Software Engineer": "Engenheiro de Software",
			"Developer": "Desenvolvedor",
			"IT Support": "Suporte de TI",
			"Data Analyst": "Analista de Dados",
			"Customer Support": "Apoio ao Cliente",
			"Sales Representative": "Representante de Vendas",
			"Administrative Assistant": "Assistente Administrativo",
			"User": "Utilizador"
		};

		return input.map(role => ({
			Name: roleTranslation[role.Name] || role.Name,
			Value: role.Name
		}));
	}
}
